contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Ethically sourced from Australia and New Zealand, our authentic 100%  sheepskin rugs use the highest quality sheep's wool for superior softness and density.  Layered over a chair or styled beside your bed, this rug instantly adds the cozy chic factor.
contentfulProduct.title: Australian Double Sheepskin Rug

content.value: Ethically sourced from Australia and New Zealand, our authentic 100% sheepskin rugs use the highest quality sheep's wool for superior softness and density. Layered over a chair or styled beside your bed, this rug instantly adds a cozy chic factor.
100% New Zealand and Australian wool on the front side and non-slip genuine leather on the reverse
Each sheepskin is ethically sourced as a by-product of the meat industry
2'x5.5' - since this is a natural hide, minor size variations may occur.
Free of harsh chemicals and dyes
Crafted in Thailand
Put three into the dryer with laundry.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 100% New Zealand and Australian wool on the front side and non-slip genuine leather on the reverse
  • Each sheepskin is ethically sourced as a by-product of the meat industry
  • 2'x5.5' - since this is a natural hide, minor size variations may occur. 
  • Free of harsh chemicals and dyes
  • Crafted in Thailand
